skills.name: When Breeze Kisses Cirrus
skills.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to #1[i]% of Hyacine's Max HP to one designated enemy.
skills.simpleDesc: Deals minor Wind DMG to one enemy.

skills.name: Love Over the Rainbow
skills.desc: Summons memosprite Little Ica. Restores HP equal to #1[f1]% of Hyacine's Max HP plus #2[i] for all allies (except Little Ica), and restores HP equal to #3[f1]% of Hyacine's Max HP plus #4[i] for Little Ica.
skills.simpleDesc: Summons memosprite Little Ica, and restores HP for all allies.

materials.name: Lost Echo of the Shared Wish
Lost Echo of the Shared Wish
Lost Echo of the Shared Wish

skills.name: We Who Fly Into Twilight
skills.desc: Summons memosprite Little Ica. Restores HP equal to #1[f1]% of Hyacine's Max HP plus #2[i] for all allies (except Little Ica), and restores HP equal to #6[f1]% of Hyacine's Max HP plus #7[i] for Little Ica. Hyacine enters the "After Rain" state, lasting for #5[i] turn(s). This duration decreases by 1 at the start of Hyacine's every turn. While "After Rain" is active, all ally targets increase their Max HP by #3[f1]% plus #4[i].
skills.simpleDesc: Summons memosprite Little Ica, and restores HP for all allies. Enters the "After Rain" state. While Hyacine is in this state, increases all allies' Max HP.

materials.name: Lost Echo of the Shared Wish
Lost Echo of the Shared Wish
Lost Echo of the Shared Wish

skills.name: First Light Heals the World
skills.desc: The memosprite Little Ica initially has Max HP equal to #1[i]% of Hyacine's Max HP. When Hyacine or Little Ica provides healing, increases Little Ica's DMG dealt by #3[i]% for #4[i] turn(s). Stacks up to #5[i] time(s).
skills.simpleDesc: When Hyacine or Little Ica provides healing, increases Little Ica's DMG dealt.

materials.name: Lost Echo of the Shared Wish
Lost Echo of the Shared Wish
Lost Echo of the Shared Wish

skills.name: Day So Right, Life So Fine!
skills.desc: When the next battle starts, restores HP by an amount equal to #1[i]% of Hyacine's Max HP plus #2[i] for all allies and increases Max HP by #3[i]%, lasting for #4[i] turn(s).
skills.simpleDesc: When the next battle starts, restores HP for all allies and increases Max HP.

eidolons.name: Cradle the Candle of Night
eidolons.desc: While Hyacine is in the "After Rain" state, all ally targets additionally increase their Max HP by <nobr>50%</nobr>, and after using an attack, immediately restore their HP by an amount equal to <nobr>8%</nobr> of Hyacine's Max HP.

eidolons.name: Come Sit in My Courtyard
eidolons.desc: When an ally target's HP decreases, SPD increases by <nobr>30%</nobr>, lasting for <nobr>2</nobr> turn(s).

eidolons.name: Depart, Unto the Sun!
eidolons.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>15</nobr>.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>10</nobr>.
Memosprite Skill Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>10</nobr>.

eidolons.name: Sunlit Amber, Yours to Keep
eidolons.desc: The "Tempestuous Halt" Trace gets enhanced: For every <nobr>1</nobr> excess SPD, additionally increases Hyacine's and Little Ica's CRIT DMG by <nobr>2%</nobr>.

eidolons.name: Twilight Drapes the Tide
eidolons.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>15</nobr>.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>15</nobr>.
Memosprite Talent Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>10</nobr>.

eidolons.name: O Sky, Heed My Plea
eidolons.desc: When Little Ica uses Memosprite Skill, the amount cleared from the tally of healing is changed to <nobr>12%</nobr>. While Little Ica is on the field, all ally targets' All-Type <u>RES PEN</u> increases by <nobr>20%</nobr>.

embedBonusSkill.name: Gloomy Grin
embedBonusSkill.desc: Increases Hyacine's and Little Ica's CRIT Rate by <nobr>100%</nobr>. When providing healing to an ally target whose current HP is equal to or less than <nobr>50%</nobr> of their Max HP, increases Hyacine's and Little Ica's Outgoing Healing by <nobr>25%</nobr>.

materials.name: Lost Echo of the Shared Wish

embedBonusSkill.name: Stormy Caress
embedBonusSkill.desc: Increases Hyacine's Effect RES by <nobr>50%</nobr>. When using Skill and Ultimate, dispels <nobr>1</nobr> <u>debuff(s)</u> from all ally targets.

materials.name: Lost Echo of the Shared Wish

embedBonusSkill.name: Tempestuous Halt
embedBonusSkill.desc: When Hyacine's SPD exceeds <nobr>200</nobr>, increases her and Little Ica's Max HP by <nobr>20%</nobr>. Then, for every <nobr>1</nobr> excess SPD, increases Hyacine's and Little Ica's Outgoing Healing by <nobr>1%</nobr>. Up to a max of <nobr>200</nobr> excess SPD can be taken into account for this effect.

materials.name: Lost Echo of the Shared Wish
